filterTypes.0: NoFilter - No specific ordering (default by Id)
filterTypes.1: NearestLocation - Orders offers by distance from user location
filterTypes.2: LastInserted - Orders offers by creation date (newest first)
filterTypes.3: MaxUsed - Orders offers by CurrentUses field (most used first)
filterTypes.4: HigherEvaluation - Orders offers by Rating field (highest first)

notes: All filter types support optional categoryId filtering
NearestLocation filter requires userLatitude and userLongitude for accurate distance calculation
MaxUsed filter uses CurrentUses field from Offer table (most used first)
HigherEvaluation uses Rating field from Offer table (highest rating first)
Response structure is identical to get-paginated-offers API
When userLatitude and userLongitude are both 0, distanceInKm will be null (no distance calculation)
Valid coordinates are required for distance calculation and NearestLocation filtering
